@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "Remainers and Leavers have similar domestic grievances Different political traditions have some different emphases but often agree with each other more than they might care to admit This way we can heal the wounds build bridges and lift our country to its full potential."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "For our progressive politics can unite Britain It provides the basis for the renewal of Britain through a new coalition Left and right workers and owners Remainers and Leavers social democrats liberals and One Nation conservatives."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "People are tired and fed up with it but dancing to the nationalists tune will not bring our country together With parliament gridlocked the only way to resolve the Brexit mess is by giving the British people a People‚Äôs Vote."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "We see it in the setting up of different groups and parts of the country against each other into ‚Äúthem and ‚Äúus‚Äù This what lies behind Nigel Farage and his Brexit Party UKIP and Tory hard right It is ugly and we have to take it on."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "We see it in the coarsening of our political debate dominated by abuse threats and those who shout the loudest We see it in the toxic discourse around immigration where immigrants are blamed for all our problems We see it in the rising tide of hate crime."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "For too long we have been defensive about our progressive politics that kind hearted progressive Britain which is generous in spirit and should be open to new ideas and people of different backgrounds is under threat like never before."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "As the new @OpiniumResearch polling which James and his team will set out shortly illustrates progressive ideas and values are alive and well and command popular support in our country."
RT @UKProgressive @ChukaUmunna ‚ÄúCentrists stand accused of trying to maintain the status quo when the opposite is true Progressive idea‚Ä¶
RT @UKProgressive @ChukaUmunna ‚ÄúPeople are tired and fed up about Brexit but we must not dance to the populists tune The only way to bre‚Ä¶

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "Because we are patriots we are internationalist too We will protect the sovereignty of the nation state which is the UK but we cannot build a good society at home in isolation from the global forces which are buffeting our people around."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "The populist left views much our mainstream media as a huge inconvenience we view a free press as vital in our democracy On the populist Right the rule of law and an independent judiciary are denounced as ‚Äúenemies of the people" we see them as integral to our democracy."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "But there is more to life than work Family life in all its forms and the importance of the place where people live are the building blocks of the communitarian ideals to which all progressives subscribe."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "Work not only provides us with the means to prosper economically but it has a value in and of itself that gives purpose identity and mission in life Our mission in policy terms should therefore be to ensure work pays and provides a level of security in a fast-changing world."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "Reciprocity is vital So as an individual if you put in the graft and play by the rules the economy will reward you and in return for the support we enjoy from society through the state we all have individual responsibilities."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "Collectively we should ensure everyone is provided with the tools to reach their full potential to live a life they have reason to value and where those who cannot provide for themselves are properly supported So we stick together we look out for our fellow citizens."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch @TheIndGroup "I set out six key values underpin in the @UKProgressive pamphlet a United Kingdom reciprocity work family and community democracy and patriotic internationalism."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch "It led us to the inescapable conclusion that our politics needs to be reconfigured to better reflect modern Britain and that was time for the different progressive political traditions to come together under one roof a new progressive party Change UK. @TheIndGroup
RT @jonwillchambers Great to be at the launch of @ChukaUmunna‚Äôs ‚ÄòWhat are progressives for? pamphlet at @UKProgressive with new research‚Ä¶

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch "The main parties have ceased to be the broad churches the main parties is a two party electoral system need to be in order for our political system to function properly It is why we left them We were driven out because they had turned their backs on progressive values."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch "Historically there has been a vibrant progressive political tradition in our country It is rooted in the social democratic centre-Left the liberal and One Nation Conservative centre-Right which has successfully worked together in times past to see our country through crises."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch "On the other side there is progressive Britain which believes we tackle these problems by being open to new ideas and people inclusive forward looking and determined to embrace the future for the sake of our children."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch "This is at the heart of the xenophobic backward looking nationalism of Nigel Farage the Brexit Party UKIP and I'm sorry to say has been adopted wholesale by the governing party the Conservatives."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch "In the face of this change and disruption there is a real risk that instead of coming together as we have done in the past and rebuilding the UK responds to the challenges of the globalisation not by asking ‚Äòhow can we solve these problems? but by asking ‚Äòwho can we blame?"
RT @UKProgressive @ChukaUmunna ‚ÄúThese European elections are about so much more than Leave and Remain It‚Äôs about who we are as a nation,‚Ä¶

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch "The 2016 Brexit vote was a symptom not the cause of how people felt about all of this The irony is that so consuming has Brexit been that so many of our country‚Äôs problems have simply not received the attention they deserve."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch "The long-term trend towards each citizen enjoying a more equal share of the national wealth has gone into reverse We have not invested sufficiently in or have appropriate skills and training systems to help people adapt to what is happening."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch "Globalisation has raised the standard of living of countless millions of poor people around the world But in advanced economies like Britain it has brought wealth to too few and insecurity to millions on low and middle incomes."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch "We are diverse but we are divided The political and cultural divides between the urban and the rural our cities and our towns the young and the old between those with varying levels of educational qualifications different ethnicities and classes is there for all to see."

@UKProgressive @OpiniumResearch "The vision presented to the world was a country at ease with itself not only proud of our history but proud of what we have become open humorous decent confident and modern That is the Britain I love."
